mapper.insert: insert into t_user_profile (ID, GMTCREATE, NAMECREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, USERID, REALNAME, BIRTHDAY, SEX, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, OPENID, PASSWORD, IDCARD, CARDNUMBER, USERTYPE, WXNAME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wxname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_user_profile set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENID = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARDNUMBER = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERTYPE = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WXNAME = #{wxname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, NAMECREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, USERID, REALNAME, BIRTHDAY, SEX, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, OPENID, PASSWORD, IDCARD, CARDNUMBER, USERTYPE, WXNAME from t_user_profile where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, NAMECREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, USERID, REALNAME, BIRTHDAY, SEX, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, OPENID, PASSWORD, IDCARD, CARDNUMBER, USERTYPE, WXNAME from t_user_profile
